conversation.message:
Hello Parent D, thank you for following up on this crucial aspect of our program. We understand that structured feedback is vital, even within a child-led framework. Our approach ensures that you receive frequent, detailed insights into your child's progress.

Specifically, we provide structured feedback through several channels: 1) Detailed digital portfolios updated regularly, showcasing observations and milestones linked to developmental domains; 2) Formal, one-on-one parent-teacher consultations held at least twice per year (or more, if needed), dedicated to reviewing specific developmental progress; and 3) Brief daily communication upon pick-up/drop-off. This system ensures transparency while respecting the child's natural pace of development.

We are delighted that our program aligns well with your child's needs. Given that you are finalizing your evaluation among top contenders and spaces are extremely limited, we strongly encourage you to move forward with your formal application immediately to ensure you receive priority consideration. We are very eager to welcome your child.
